price: Ndio hivyo hivyo. Na Sisi tulizijua vilivyo khabari zake zote.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا
footnotes: Na kama Dhul-Qarnaini alivyo waita watu wa magharibi waje kuamini basi kadhaalika aliwaita hawa, na akenda nao mwendo ule ule wake wa mwanzo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
